OOC: are allowed write in the same post a missile and other attack?

Blacknightmare:

One of the missiles hits her and fell, but she quickly stood up and 
fired 14 energy-balls and one missile in the same time that Predator 
landed on his feet


--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Predator:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Transforming to beast mode, he leapt mightily, avoiding the feather 
missiles. 
>  Transforming in mid air, he fired two missiles at Blacknightmare, 
landing 
> gracefully on his feet.
